pages.text: $(li)The Hat Launcher is a tool that can be used to cover creatures with any of your current hats of the $(l:patchouli:perks/hats)Hats$(/l) mod.$(br)$(li)Just right click while you are holding this tool in your hand to shoot a random hat.

$(li)If you hit a creature with this shooted hat, it will start to wear that hat.$(br)$(li)If the hat falls to the ground, it will appear like an static entity.$(br)$(li)When any creature walks very near this hat, it will weat it.
